definitions.definition: A member of a religious order, i.e. a monk or nun.

definitions.example: It is the job of this court to rule on legal matters. We do not consider religious issues.

definitions.definition: Committed to the practice or adherence of religion.
definitions.example: I was much more religious as a teenager than I am now.

definitions.definition: Highly dedicated, as one would be to a religion.
definitions.example: I'm a religious fan of college basketball.
